entity.name: Stage 10: Albertville to Valence
entity.description: The Alps will provide a spectacular backdrop rather than a direct challenge for the riders today, as Stage 10 of the Tour de France winds its way through the valley floors. But the general classification contenders will have to be every bit as alert as the sprinters, as wind could make this perfect echelon territory. Concentration and team organisation will be key.
